name: Snow Arena
detailed_description:
Snow Arena is an online hide and seek game. A great game where you can make snowball fight all season. If you want to spend time with your friends you should play this game. Those who love winter will love this game!

Online Snowball Fight


In the game you are managing a snowman character. There are fake snowmen in the game. Your friend may think you're fake if you don't stand and move. So you can throw the snowball at him! If you successfully hide, you may be the first in the game.

Hide and Seek


No weapons in this game. There is only snowball in this game. But you will have a limited number of snowballs. When the snowball is finished, you will have to go to the snowball shop in the particular part of the map and buy some snowball.

Make Money


You have to kill enemies to make money. You earn some money each time you kill a enemy. With this money, you can get more snowballs. So you can be superior to those who don't have money.
